thread.title: Behold - the Yorkshire pudding BURGER is coming to Manchester
thread.title_full: Behold - the Yorkshire pudding BURGER is coming to Manchester

author: Emily Heward
title: Behold - the Yorkshire pudding BURGER is coming to Manchester
text:
Market Wraps' Yorkshire pudding burger (Photo: Twitter) Share Get What's On   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
First came the Yorkshire pudding butty , courtesy of Northern Quarter butchers and deli The Butcher's Quarter. 
And just when we thought we had reached peak pud, along comes the Yorkshire pudding BURGER from street food outlet Market Wraps. 
BEHOLD: 
The Leeds-based team will be bringing their vintage horsebox trailer across the Pennines to appear at the GRUB Food Fair at Alphabet Brew Co this Saturday. 
They'll also be dishing up Yorkshire pudding wraps, stuffed with slow-cooked beef or pork, and grilled cheese sandwiches. Read More How to make a Cadbury's Creme Scotch Egg Yorkshire pudding wrap (Photo: Twitter) 
GRUB is free to attend and takes place at Alphabet, at 99 North Western Street, every Saturday from 12pm to 10pm. 
Food tends to sell out sooner, however, so it's best to get down as early as possible. 
Other traders confirmed for this weekend's event include Purely Pizza, The Otto-Men, Holy Crab and Choux Choux. Read More
